document_data.name: Mees
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mees''' was the steward of [[Escanor Tanthul]] that lived in [[Thultanthar]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|It shall be done this day.|Mees, agreeing to teach [[Aris (giant)|Aris]] about Shadovar gloom sculptures.}}
document_data.Relationships: Mees was quite skilled at understanding the wants of Prince Escanor with only the slightest hint or gesture.
document_data.History: Mees, [[Rapha]], and the rest of Escanor's attendants were present with the Prince of Shade when he met with [[Galaeron Nihmedu]], [[Vala Thorsdotter]], [[Aris (giant)|Aris]], and [[Malik el Sami]] at [[Villa Dusari]] on [[Mirtul 9]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
